<a id="ShaderIncludeDB"></a>

# ShaderIncludeDB

**Inherits:** [Object](Object.md)

Internal database of built in shader include files.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This object contains shader fragments from Redot's internal shaders. These can be used when access to internal uniform buffers and/or internal functions is required for instance when composing compositor effects or compute shaders. Only fragments for the current rendering device are loaded.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="ShaderIncludeDB_method_get_built_in_include_file"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **get_built_in_include_file**\ (\ filename\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="static">static</span> [ðŸ”—](#ShaderIncludeDB_method_get_built_in_include_file)

Returns the code for the built-in shader fragment. You can also access this in your shader code through ``#include "filename"``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ShaderIncludeDB_method_has_built_in_include_file"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **has_built_in_include_file**\ (\ filename\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="static">static</span> [ðŸ”—](#ShaderIncludeDB_method_has_built_in_include_file)

Returns ``true`` if an include file with this name exists.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ShaderIncludeDB_method_list_built_in_include_files"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedStringArray](PackedStringArray.md) **list_built_in_include_files**\ (\ ) <span class="static">static</span> [ðŸ”—](#ShaderIncludeDB_method_list_built_in_include_files)

Returns a list of built-in include files that are currently registered.
